name: Minor Problems
description:
Minerva and Tobias, a sister and a brother, fell out years ago and now they are trying to sort out their problems by going through their childhood memories. They used to be close and now they need to remember the tight bond they used to have.

In their memories, Toby is a little rascal who never runs out of ideas. He is as brave as a knight, as long as big sister Mindy is the one scouting the road ahead. His "helmet", a red bucket, protects him from the darkness and shadows. Mindy is a sweet and imaginative little lady who's strength you could compare to that of a tiger. She is always carrying her little cat plushie around as a guardian angel.
